hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
. /etc/profile.d/proxy.sh
# =============== deploy OSC for Newton from master ===================
outputDir=/var/www/vsc-builds/master-all/ #outputDir=/var/www/vsc-builds/0.8.0-all/
echo outputDir $outputDir buildVersion=`ls -t $outputDir | awk 'NR=1' | head -1` echo buildVersion $buildVersion VSPHERE_SDK_URL=https://10.3.204.201/sdk VSPHERE_IP=10.3.204.201:9443 VSPHERE_USER='Administrator@vsphere.local' VSPHERE_PASSWORD='Admin!23' ESXI_HOST_IP=10.3.204.107 DATASTORE_NAME=lun02 NETWORK_NAME=Network-320 echo -outputDir-buildVersion $outputDir$buildVersion OVF_NAME=`ls $outputDir$buildVersion | grep ovf | tr -d '\r' | tr -d '\n'` OVF_PATH=$outputDir$buildVersion/$OVF_NAME #OVF_PATH= /var/www/vsc-builds/master-all/Build1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-57-gff26ed1/OSC-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-57-gff26ed1.ovf echo $OVF_PATH #OSC_VM_NAME=`echo $OVF_NAME | cut -f 1 -d '.'` OSC_VM_NAME=CI_OSC OSC_VM_NETMASK=255.255.252.0 OSC_VM_GATEWAY=10.3.207.251 OSC_VM_DNS=10.3.86.116 OSC_VM_IP=10.3.205.104 DATA_CENTER=SC12 HOST=10.3.204.107
#working one #java -jar /var/tmp/deploy-ovf.jar 'https://10.3.204.201/sdk' 'Administrator@vsphere.local' 'Admin!23' 10.3.204.107 '/var/www/vsc-builds/master/Build163-g068505a/OSC-163-g068505a.ovf' 'OSC-163-g068505a' 'lun02' 'network-320' 10.3.205.104 255.255.252.0 10.3.207.251 10.3.86.116
#java -jar /var/tmp/deploy-ovf.jar https://10.3.204.201/sdk Administrator@vsphere.local Admin!23 10.3.204.107 /var/www/vsc-builds/master-all/Build1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-58-g6fa6d4d/OSC-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT-58-g6fa6d4d.ovf CI_OSC lun02 Network-320 10.3.205.104 255.255.252.0 10.3.207.251 10.3.86.116 java -jar /var/tmp/deploy-ovf.jar $VSPHERE_SDK_URL "$VSPHERE_USER" "$VSPHERE_PASSWORD" $ESXI_HOST_IP $OVF_PATH $OSC_VM_NAME $DATASTORE_NAME $NETWORK_NAME $OSC_VM_IP $OSC_VM_NETMASK $OSC_VM_GATEWAY $OSC_VM_DNS
# =============== deploy OSC for Ocata from master ===================
outputDir=/var/www/vsc-builds/master-all/ echo outputDir $outputDir buildVersion=`ls -t $outputDir | awk 'NR=1' | head -1` echo buildVersion $buildVersion VSPHERE_SDK_URL=https://10.3.240.201/sdk VSPHERE_IP=10.3.240.201:9443 VSPHERE_USER='Administrator@vsphere.local' VSPHERE_PASSWORD='Admin!23' ESXI_HOST_IP=10.3.242.124 DATASTORE_NAME='datatstore1' NETWORK_NAME='VM Network' echo -outputDir-buildVersion $outputDir$buildVersion OVF_NAME=`ls $outputDir$buildVersion | grep ovf | tr -d '\r' | tr -d '\n'` OVF_PATH=$outputDir$buildVersion/$OVF_NAME echo $OVF_PATH #OSC_VM_NAME=`echo $OVF_NAME | cut -f 1 -d '.'` OSC_VM_NAME=CI_OSC-241-211 OSC_VM_NETMASK=255.255.252.0 OSC_VM_GATEWAY=10.3.243.251 OSC_VM_DNS=10.3.86.116 OSC_VM_IP=10.3.241.211 DATA_CENTER='Physical Datacenter' HOST=10.3.242.124
java -jar /var/tmp/deploy-ovf.jar $VSPHERE_SDK_URL "$VSPHERE_USER" "$VSPHERE_PASSWORD" $ESXI_HOST_IP $OVF_PATH $OSC_VM_NAME "$DATASTORE_NAME" "$NETWORK_NAME" $OSC_VM_IP $OSC_VM_NETMASK $OSC_VM_GATEWAY $OSC_VM_DNS sleep 240
python3 /var/tmp/osc-tools/check-openstack-health/check-newton-health.py echo $?
python3 /var/tmp/osc-tools/check-openstack-health/check-ocata-health.py echo $?
exit 0
